abilities.description: Allows the user to create, control, and transform into fire. The user's body becomes intangible fire.
Ace demonstrates the ability to generate intense heat from within after being swallowed, cooking the Sandora Lizard from the inside out.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness to seawater and Seastone

keyMoments.title: Ace Cooks Sandora Lizard from Inside
keyMoments.description: After being swallowed whole by a giant Sandora Lizard, Ace uses his Mera Mera no Mi powers to generate intense heat from within, cooking the lizard from the inside and providing food for the crew.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates a creative application of the Mera Mera no Mi's powers—using internal heat generation as both an escape method and hunting technique.

reveals.information: The Mera Mera no Mi can be used to generate heat from within even when the user is swallowed, allowing them to cook their predator from the inside
